messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Looking for AI voluenteers! Lemme know if you want the chance

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: HoP is going mining for a short while, PDA me if you need something

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Comms is down, CE get on it

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Telecomms Server Room.

messages.body:

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Bow Solar Array.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: HoP going SSD, leave my corgi army alone

messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a pack of mice have descended into the [REDACTED].
